WorkItem.ClosedComment: Affected by commit 51770. Enforce Gem Requirements has been moved to the options dialog. Astry does not want to separate the options, but I made the setting for it anyway, which works but is hidden for now
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Separate 'Enforce Gem Requirements' to multiple options

Comments.Message: So that WOT really says: I want Gem Requirements for different stuff separated instead of tied to the same checkbox.

No Jothay what he is saying is exactly the same issue as I previously raised. Equip 3 JC gems then right click an item and choose equip custom gemming. The drop down item comparison on the gem slots give JC gems as options as that comparison is not respecting the fact you already have 3 JC gems equipped. Its a bug.
Jothay, Levva you are both right, maybe I should have seperated this into two issues, but how you both described it, is exactly what I meant, both of it.
Fix for JC gems showing when already 3 equipped committed.
